messages.content: SMAX is a search-based software which helps users to quickly find the information they need. It utilizes artificial intelligence and natural language processing to allow users to query using any terms they choose and return the most relevant results.
In the context of software products.

In the context of software products, scalability is the ability of a system to handle increasing amounts of work, users, and data without compromising performance or reliability. It allows a system to grow and adapt to changing needs and conditions.
Yes, Micro Focus produces a range of software products, including software development tools, security software, and IT management solutions.
